claim: The owner of the excerpt post with the hypothesis-testing tag is "Gerry" based in Toronto, Canada.
extra_info: user who owned the excerpt post with hypothesis-testing tag refers to OwnerUserId WHERE TagName = 'hypothesis-testing';
reasoning: The owner of the excerpt post with the hypothesis-testing tag has DisplayName 'mbq' and Location 'Warsaw, Poland', not 'Gerry' based in 'Toronto, Canada' as the claim states.

content.content:
CREATE TABLE posts
(
    Id                    INTEGER          not null UNIQUE
        primary key,
    PostTypeId            INTEGER          null,
    AcceptedAnswerId      INTEGER          null,
    CreaionDate           DATETIME     null,
    Score                 INTEGER          null,
    ViewCount             INTEGER          null,
    Body                  TEXT     null,
    OwnerUserId           INTEGER          null,
    LasActivityDate       DATETIME     null,
    Title                 TEXT null,
    Tags                  TEXT null,
    AnswerCount           INTEGER          null,
    CommentCount          INTEGER          null,
    FavoriteCount         INTEGER          null,
    LastEditorUserId      INTEGER          null,
    LastEditDate          DATETIME     null,
    CommunityOwnedDate    DATETIME    null,
    ParentId              INTEGER          null,
    ClosedDate            DATETIME     null,
    OwnerDisplayName      TEXT null,
    LastEditorDisplayName TEXT null,
        foreign key (LastEditorUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (OwnerUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (ParentId) references posts (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

content.content:
CREATE TABLE tags
(
    Id            INTEGER          not null
        primary key,
    TagName       TEXT null,
    Count         INTEGER          null,
    ExcerptPostId INTEGER          null,
    WikiPostId    INTEGER          null,
    foreign key (ExcerptPostId) references posts (Id)
        on update cascade on delete cascade
);

content.text: Now I can see the schema. The `tags` table has `ExcerptPostId` which links to posts, and posts have `OwnerUserId` which links to users. Users have `DisplayName` and `Location`. Let me query for the owner of the excerpt post with the hypothesis-testing tag.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/codebase_community.sqlite" "SELECT u.DisplayName, u.Location FROM tags t JOIN posts p ON t.ExcerptPostId = p.Id JOIN users u ON p.OwnerUserId = u.Id WHERE t.TagName = 'hypothesis-testing';"
input.description: Find the owner of the excerpt post with hypothesis-testing tag

content.text:
The query results show:
- **DisplayName**: "mbq" (not "Gerry")
- **Location**: "Warsaw, Poland" (not "Toronto, Canada")

Both the name and location in the claim are wrong. The actual owner is "mbq" based in "Warsaw, Poland".

```json
{"label": "CONTRADICTED", "reasoning": "The owner of the excerpt post with the hypothesis-testing tag has DisplayName 'mbq' and Location 'Warsaw, Poland', not 'Gerry' based in 'Toronto, Canada' as the claim states."}
```
